foreignData.name: Schildwache des Konsuls
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Schildwache des Konsuls ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du {E}{E} (zwei Energiemarken).
Immer wenn die Schildwache des Konsuls angreift, kannst du {E} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, erhält eine andere angreifende Kreatur deiner Wahl Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Cortescudo del cónsul
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Cortescudo del cónsul entre al campo de batalla, obtienes {E}{E} (dos contadores de energía).
Siempre que el Cortescudo del cónsul ataque, puedes pagar {E}. Si lo haces, otra criatura atacante objetivo gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Gardebouclier du consul
foreignData.text:
Quand le Gardebouclier du consul arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez {E}{E} (deux marqueurs « énergie »).
À chaque fois que le Gardebouclier du consul attaque, vous pouvez payer {E}. Si vous faites ainsi, une autre créature attaquante ciblée acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Guardiascudo del Console
foreignData.text:
Quando il Guardiascudo del Console entra nel campo di battaglia, ottieni {E}{E} (due segnalini energia).
Ogniqualvolta il Guardiascudo del Console attacca, puoi pagare {E}. Se lo fai, un'altra creatura attaccante bersaglio ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: 領事の盾護員
foreignData.text:
領事の盾護員が戦場に出たとき、あなたは{E}{E}（エネルギー・カウンター２個）を得る。
領事の盾護員が攻撃するたび、他の攻撃クリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたは{E}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、ターン終了時まで、それは破壊不能を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドワーフ・兵士

foreignData.name: 영사의 방패경비대
foreignData.text:
영사의 방패경비대가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 {E}{E}(에너지 카운터 두 개)를 얻는다.
영사의 방패경비대가 공격할 때마다, 당신은 {E}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 다른 공격생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다.

foreignData.name: Guarda Escudo do Cônsul
foreignData.text:
Quando Guarda Escudo do Cônsul entra no campo de batalha, você recebe {E}{E} (dois marcadores de energia).
Toda vez que Guarda Escudo do Cônsul ataca, você pode pagar {E}. Se fizer isso, outra criatura atacante alvo ganha indestrutível até o final do turno.

foreignData.name: Щитоносец Консула
foreignData.text:
Когда Щитоносец Консула выходит на поле битвы, вы получаете {E}{E} (два жетона энергии).
Каждый раз, когда Щитоносец Консула атакует, вы можете заплатить {E}. Если вы это делаете, другое целевое атакующее существо получает Неразрушимость до конца хода.

foreignData.name: 执政官盾卫
foreignData.text:
当执政官盾卫进战场时，你得到{E}{E}（两个能量指示物）。
每当执政官盾卫攻击时，你可以支付{E}。若你如此作，则另一个目标进行攻击的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

foreignData.name: 執政官盾衛
foreignData.text:
當執政官盾衛進戰場時，你得到{E}{E}（兩個能量指示物）。
每當執政官盾衛攻擊時，你可以支付{E}。若你如此作，則另一個目標進行攻擊的生物獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。

name: Consul's Shieldguard
originalText:
When Consul's Shieldguard enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Consul's Shieldguard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

rulings.text: {E} is the energy symbol. It represents one energy counter.
Energy counters are a kind of counter that a player may have. They're not associated with specific permanents. (Other kinds of counters that players may have include poison and experience.)
Keep careful track of how many energy counters each player has. You may do so by keeping a running count on paper, by using a die, or by any other clear and mutually agreeable method.

If an effect says you get one or more {E}, you get that many energy counters. To pay one or more {E}, you lose that many energy counters. Any effects that interact with counters a player gets, has, or loses can interact with energy counters.
Energy counters aren't mana. They don't go away as steps, phases, and turns end, and effects that add mana “of any type” to your mana pool can't give you energy counters.
You can't pay more energy counters than you have.

Some triggered abilities state that you “may pay” a certain amount of {E}. You can't pay that amount multiple times to multiply the effect. You simply choose whether or not to pay that amount of {E} as the ability resolves, and no player may take actions to try to stop the ability's effect after you make your choice.

If a triggered ability with one or more targets states that you “may pay” some amount of {E}, and each permanent that it targets has become an illegal target, the ability doesn't resolve. You can't pay {E} even if you want to.

text:
When Consul's Shieldguard enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Consul's Shieldguard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
